---
Help: Radera en tidskrift
---
!contents -R2 -g -p -f -h
!1 Testar radera en tidskrift
Det ska gå att radera en tidskrift via REST API:et.

!***> Skapa en ny tidskrift

Först skapar vi en tidskrift, för att sedan kunna radera den

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | json | testCreateRecordCreatedType? | getStatusType? | getCreatedId? |
| $everythingAuthToken | journal | {"children":[{"children":[{"children":[{"name":"linkedRecordType","value":"system"},{"name":"linkedRecordId","value":"diva"}],"name":"dataDivider"},{"children":[{"name":"linkedRecordType","value":"validationType"},{"name":"linkedRecordId","value":"journal"}],"name":"validationType"}],"name":"recordInfo"},{"name":"mainTitle","value":"Fitnesse journal to be deleted"},{"name":"subTitle","value":"Fitnesse journal to be deleted (eng)"},{"name":"ISSN","value":"1234-5678"},{"name":"EISSN","value":"9876-5432"},{"name":"URL","value":"www.journal.com"},{"name":"journalOA","value":"trueOA"},{"name":"closedDate","value":"2012-01-01"}],"name":"journal"} | journal | CREATED | $createdId= |

*!
!***> Läs den nyskapade tidskriften i Json

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | id | testReadRecord? | getStatusType? |
| $everythingAuthToken | journal | $createdId | =~/"value":"Fitnesse journal to be deleted"/ | OK |

*!
!***> Lista tidskrifter

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | testReadRecordList? | getStatusType? |
| $everythingAuthToken | journal | | OK |

*!
!***> Radera den nyskapade tidskriften

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | id | testDeleteRecord? | getStatusType? |
| $everythingAuthToken | journal | $createdId | | OK |

*!
!***> Försök läsa den raderade tidskriften

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | id | testReadRecord? | getStatusType? |
| $everythingAuthToken | journal | $createdId | | NOT_FOUND |

*!
!***> Lista tidskrifter - tidskrifter med status DELETED exkluderas

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | testReadRecordList? | getStatusType? |
| $everythingAuthToken | journal | | OK |
